response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the chicken inside the fridge. Now, we need to close the fridge as per the original subtasks.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the bottom cabinet.
(2) Take out the steak.
(3) Take out the chicken.
(4) Open the fridge.
(5) Put the steak in the fridge.
(6) Put the chicken in the fridge.
(7) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
